text:
Love how this centre has fantastic facilities and interactive zones for the children to learn and explore. Best part, they allow learning to take place beyond the classrooms by bringing the kids outdoor in their daily routine.

Also, very thankful the teachers here are very caring and patient which helps a lot in allowing my child in adapting to the new school environment. Definitely would recommend this school to all parents!

We are very happy to have enrolled our child here. The owners and staff are very friendly, kind and patient!

As a first time parent, it brings lots of comfort to know that our little one is well taken care of. Personally I love how well planned the curriculums are and how consistent the teachers are in guiding the little ones to be independent in school. They are also very attentive to details and are always there to answer your queries.

An overall great learning environment with fantastic facilities! We highly recommend this centre to all parents!

This centre has a great outdoor program that allows our children to explore the outdoors and bond with the teacher differently. My child  has since improve a lot in terms of motor, social skills. Great for those young children who only attend school for the first time at 18 months. Centre is very clean and new. Teachers are very patient, dedicated and writes weekly review to update us parents on their progresss.

The centre is equipped with amazing facilities and well-planned curriculum. The teachers are very friendly and lovely too. And they bring our kid to outdoor park every day ðŸ¥° My boy is so happy every time he going to the park.

Great learning environment for kids. The activities planned included outdoor park play, muffin baking, pizza making, art & craft time. My kid is enjoying himself in the school and learnt new things everyday.
